benchmark_details.name: Scene-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: Scene-Bench is a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating factual consistency in natural scene generation from scene graphs. It includes MegaSG, a dataset with one million images annotated with scene graphs, and SGScore, a novel evaluation metric that assesses accuracy of object presence and relationships.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and enhance factual consistency in natural scene generation from scene graphs.

data.source: Images collected from COCO, Object365, and Open Images v6, annotated with scene graphs.
data.annotation: Manually annotated using multimodal large language models.

methodology.calculation: SGScore evaluates the overall quality of the scene graph based on object and relationship recall.
methodology.interpretation: Higher SGScore indicates better factual consistency between generated images and intended scene graphs.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments demonstrating improved factual consistency.
